channel.title: Dc's + Start Up Message
channel.description: Ok so im using impozzes client, and when i log in it has a welcome message, the background of this says ""pvpscapes""...anyone know where i can change this? cant find it in sprites...my next problems alot harder..whenever i click the ""bank all"" button or some other certain things on the server my client freezes for about 10 seconds then resumes normally after, without logging me off. Im not sure if its the client or the source. Please Help!! Will give Rep!

item.title: Dc's + Start Up Message
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Here’s my attempt to try to help…

put “pause” at the bottom of your runserver.bat or run.bat and click on a skill and post the error here.

OR if there is no error you just dc then in clicking buttons someone took the time to add disconnected = true; to every skill button.

Read full topic

item.title: Dc's + Start Up Message
item.dc:creator: @QQmuchnerd QQmuchnerd
item.description:
@QQmuchnerd wrote:

Storm Powner:

look in the sprites folder for a file called background.png other whise look into the cache with tom’s cache editor any size

thankyou. Now to focus on this pesky dc issue :(…

Read full topic

item.title: Dc's + Start Up Message
item.dc:creator: @QQmuchnerd QQmuchnerd
item.description:
@QQmuchnerd wrote:

Ok so im using impozzes client, and when i log in it has a welcome message, the background of this says ““pvpscapes””…anyone know where i can change this? cant find it in sprites…my next problems alot harder…whenever i click the ““bank all”” button or some other certain things on the server my client freezes for about 10 seconds then resumes normally after, without logging me off. Im not sure if its the client or the source. Please Help!! Will give Rep!

Read full topic
